German[edit]

Feiertag
Wikipedia de

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfaɪɐ̯taːk/ (standard)
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • IPA(key): /ˈfaɪɐ̯tax/ (northern Germany and parts of central Germany; chiefly colloquial)
  • IPA(key): /ˈfaɪɐ̯taːx/ (parts of central Germany; chiefly colloquial)

Noun[edit]

Feiertag m (genitive Feiertags or Feiertages, plural Feiertage)

  1. holiday (day on which a festival, etc, is traditionally observed)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Feiertag
